welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Toluca, a city known for its charming colonial architecture and vibrant cultural scene. Get ready to explore its rich history, delicious food, and beautiful surroundings. Enjoy your time here!"

restaurants.name: Bistró Mecha Centro Histórico
restaurants.description: Bistró Mecha Centro Histórico is a bistro located in Toluca de Lerdo.
restaurants.address: Aldama Nte. 102, 50090 Toluca de Lerdo, México

restaurants.name: La Vaquita Negra Del Portal
restaurants.description: La Vaquita Negra Del Portal is a sandwich spot located in Toluca de Lerdo.
restaurants.address: Portal Reforma 124 Int. B, Col. Centro (Nicolas Bravo e Independencia), 50000 Toluca de Lerdo, México

restaurants.name: Tortas Lerdo
restaurants.description: Tortas Lerdo is a sandwich spot located in Toluca.
restaurants.address: Sebastian Lerdo de Tejada (Sor Juana Ines de la Cruz), Toluca, Me

restaurants.name: Huaraches “El Zacatecano”
restaurants.description: Huaraches “El Zacatecano” is a mexican restaurant located in Toluca de Lerdo.

restaurants.name: Carniceria "La Alianza"
restaurants.description: Carniceria "La Alianza" is a steakhouse located in Toluca de Lerdo.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Licenciado Adolfo Lopez Mateos International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Licenciado Adolfo Lopez Mateos International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
